<html><body><div><div class="mx-auto mb-6 px-4 md:px-0 text-lg font-normal leading-8 text-gray-800"><p class="Paragraph_wrapper__6w7GG">"Instead of respecting the right of 50,000 people who turned up to express their outrage against our government celebrating someone accused of inciting genocide, the police resorted to unleashing unseen violent repression," Palestine Action Group Sydney wrote in a social media post.</p></div></div></body></html>
